This is a  TEAM RESURRECTiON patch and they have an excellent reputation for putting good cracks and patches however, this one does not work w/ ver 6.1.6.0
Okay, I rescind my last comment. Apparently the patch does work, but TEAM RESURRECTiON created the patch to only work if AnyDVD is installed on drive C: Path = C:\Program Files\SlySoft\AnyDVD
